description: The classic New Orleans rye whiskey drink, the De la Louisiane No. 4, is reimagined by A Thursday in Savannah cocktail using an American Single Malt Scotch Whiskey.This drink is not for those looking for an easy sipper.&nbsp;Absinthe and&nbsp;vermouth add depth to this complex cocktail, and with a perfect balance of sweetness and bitterness, it will surely please any scotch whisky lover!
keywords: How To A Thursday In Savannah
A Thursday In Savannah  Cocktail Recipe
name: A Thursday In Savannah
recipeIngredient: 1¾ oz. Westland Garryana American Single Malt Whiskey
1 oz. Hammer & Tongs La Afrique Vermouth
½ oz. Blaum Brothers Illinois Absinthe

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all the ingredients in a coupe glass or any glassware of your choice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a coupe glass or any glassware of your choice.

recipeInstructions.name: Add some ice and stir well.
recipeInstructions.text: Add some ice and stir well.
